RelatedSentence: Leeds Bradford Airport has announced a new addition to its route network , as Jet2.com commences services to Verona , Italy .

Tony Hallwood , aviation development and marketing director at Leeds Bradford Airport , said : It is a pleasure to launch new services to Verona with Jet2.com , a welcome addition to the airlines extensive European route network available from Leeds Bradford Airport .

Tony Hallwood , aviation development and marketing director at Leeds Bradford Airport , said : It is a pleasure to launch new services to Verona with Jet2.com , a welcome addition to the airlines extensive European route network available from Leeds Bradford Airport .
Jet2.com 's services to Verona will depart each Wednesday , leaving Leeds Bradford at 14:00 , touching down in the destination at 17:15 .
Return flights leave Verona at 17:55 each Wednesday , arriving back to Leeds Bradford at 19:10 .
